content: I'm trying to improve my social media presence and was wondering if you could give me some tips on creating engaging content for my Twitter account. I recently started participating in a weekly Twitter chat on Thursdays about social media marketing, and it's been helpful, but I want to do more. By the way, I've noticed that my tutorial on social media analytics on YouTube has been doing well, with 542 views, and I'm thinking of creating more content around that topic.
